    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>oai:fnbe.profium.com:http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=169&file=169_SLIPIN-LEVITTAMINEN.JPG</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>fnbe</catalog>
            <entry>http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=169&file=169_SLIPIN-LEVITTAMINEN.JPG</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fi">Slipin levittäminen</string>
            <string language="en">Spreading of slip</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbreiten des Beleges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propagation de la glissade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espalhar do deslizamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diffusione dello slittamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάδοση της ολίσθησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El separarse del resbalón</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten kaksi- tai useampiosaisen prässimuotin rikotulle pinnalle levitetään slippi.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how slip (liquid clay) is spread on the broken surface of a press mould of two or several pieces.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquid</string>
            <string language="en">clay</string>
            <string language="en">slip</string>
            <string language="fi">tai</string>
            <string language="fi">savi</string>
            <string language="fi">kaksi-</string>
            <string language="fi">muottitekniikka,</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">prässimuotit</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
            <string language="fi">useampiosaiset</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung Erscheinen, wie Beleg (flüssiger 
Lehm) auf der unterbrochenen Oberfläche einer Presseform von zwei 
verbritten wird oder einige Stücke.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les expositions de schéma comment la glissade 
(argile liquide) est écartée sur la surface cassée d'un moule de 
presse de deux ou plusieurs morceaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As mostras do desenho como o deslizamento (argila 
líquida) é espalhado na superfície quebrada de um molde da imprensa
de dois ou diversas partes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le esposizioni dell'illustrazione come lo 
slittamento (argilla liquida) è sparso sulla superficie rotta di una 
muffa della pressa di due o parecchie parti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς η ολίσθηση (υγρός άργιλος)
διαδίδεται στη σπασμένη επιφάνεια μιας φόρμας Τύπου δύο ή 
περισσότερων κομματιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las demostraciones del gráfico cómo el resbalón 
(arcilla líquida) se separa en la superficie quebrada de un molde de 
la prensa de dos o varios pedazos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüssigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beleg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">liquide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resbalón</string>
          </keyword>
